metadata.title: CVE-2016-2812 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Race condition in the get implementation in the ServiceWorkerManager classin the Service Worker subsystem in Mozilla Firefox before 46.0 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(buffer overflow and application crash) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
